name: Liz Cheney
summary: House Republican Conference Chair who served on the January 6 Committee and endorsed Kamala Harris after losing her primary due to Trump opposition.

keyStatements.quote: I don't believe we have the luxury of writing in candidates' names, particularly in swing states.
I will not support Trump if he runs in 2024.

timeline.significance: Ousted for criticizing Trump over January 6
One of two Republicans on the committee
Crossed party lines to oppose Trump

credibility.background: Daughter of Vice President Dick Cheney, conservative Republican with strong GOP credentials
positions: Chair of the House Republican Conference (2019-2021)
Vice Chair of the January 6 Committee (2021-2023)

oppositionReasons: Duty to Constitution over party loyalty
endorsement: Endorsed Kamala Harris for President in 2024

sources.title: Liz Cheney says she won't support Trump if he runs in 2024
